epiparameter: Library of Epidemiological Parameters with Helper Functions and Classes

Source: R/epiparameter-package.R
epiparameter-package.Rd

Library of epidemiological parameters for infectious diseases and a set of classes and helper functions.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/epiverse-trace/epiparameter/

  • https://epiverse-trace.github.io/epiparameter/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/epiverse-trace/epiparameter/issues
